Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier report of a minor fire at track level at Rosemont. Allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier report of a minor fire at track level at Rosemont.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #67 67th-69th-71st Temporary Reroute at 67th/Blackstone
ShortDescription: 67 67th-69th-71st buses are temporarily rerouted via 67th, Cottage Grove, Marquette, Stony Island, and 67th due to, street blockage near 67th/Blackstone.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#67 67th-69th-71st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 67th, Cottage Grove, Marquette, Stony Island, and 67th due to, street blockage near 67th/Blackstone.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #147 Outer DuSable Lake Shore Express, #151 Sheridan Temporary Northbound Reroute near Lake Shore Dr/Belmont
ShortDescription: NB 147 Outer DuSable Lake Shore Express, 151 Sheridan buses are temp. rerouted via Lake Shore Drive, Fullerton, and Cannon Drive near Lake Shore Dr/Belmont.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #147 Outer DuSable Lake Shore Express and #151 Sheridan buses are temporarily rerouted via Lake Shore Drive, Fullerton, and Cannon Drive due to, construction near Lake Shore Dr/Belmont.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
